description: drawing of sculpted head of woman with round face and rather thick neck; hair in waves--wearing headband
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

on back, in black ink: [Roma 30 May 1776 - Testa di Giunone - nel Campidoglio = 4 Pc.]; on back, in pencil: [P 64-2=131]
markings: LRC, stamped in black: [REMEMBER / (unicorn) / C N]
provenance: George Horne (b. 1734) Paxton and Wedderburn; by descent to H. P. Horne, Lugt 2804 (1841-1926), London. [Alistair Mathews, Bournemouth, England, until 1974; sold September 8, for Â£20, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1974-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Head of Empress Sabina
